channel.title: alternative financial company on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
goeasy Logo
goeasy Ltd. is a Canadian public alternative financial company based in Mississauga, Ontario. It operates in two segments: easyfinancial, which offers high-interest loans to subprime borrowers, and easyhome, which sells furniture and other durable goods on a rent-to-own basis. As of 2016, easyfinancial had $344 million in loans, and goeasy had a market value of $400 million as of March 2017. It is listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange.
You can download thegoeasylogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: goeasy
item.description: goeasy Ltd. is a Canadian public alternative financial company based in Mississauga, Ontario. It operates in two segments: easyfinancial, which offers high-interest loans to subprime borrowers, and easyhome, which sells furniture and other durable goods on a rent-to-own basis. As of 2016, easyfinancial had $344 million in loans, and goeasy had a market value of $400 million as of March 2017. It is listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange.
